text: Alukuli is a panchayat village in Gobichettipalayam taluk in Erode District of Tamil Nadu state, India. It is about 9 km from Gobichettipalayam and 45 km from district headquarters Erode. The village is located on the road connecting Gobichettipalayam with Coimbatore. Alukuli has a population of about 6974. ==References== Category:Villages in Erode district
title: Alukuli
